title: SequenceLocation
description: A Location defined by an interval on a referenced Sequence.

_id.description: Location Id. MUST be unique within document.

sequence_id.description: A VRS Computed Identifier for the reference Sequence.

start.description: The start coordinate or range of the interval. The minimum value of this coordinate or range is 0. MUST represent a coordinate or range less than the value of `end`.

end.description: The end coordinate or range of the interval. The minimum value of this coordinate or range is 0. MUST represent a coordinate or range greater than the value of `start`.
